greeting_responses: Oh wonderful! I've been waiting for a call like this!
This is so exciting! Tell me everything!
Perfect timing! I was just thinking about this!
Oh my goodness, this is amazing! I'm so glad you called!
Yes! Yes! I'm so interested! Please tell me more!

This is perfect! I have so many questions!

Oh my, this is incredible! Please continue!
